<body><script>

    target[property] = value
    updateView()
    //updateViewç­‰ä»·äº Vue çš„ new Vue({data:{count:0}}).$mount('#app')

  document.querySelector("#app").innerHTML = reactiveData.count

  reactiveData.count ++
